mapper.select: SELECT mr.mrcode, mr.mno, m.username, mr.menuName, mr.category, mr.imgUrl FROM menu_request mr LEFT JOIN member m ON mr.mno = m.mno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (menuName, category, imgUrl, VIEW, type) values (#{mDto.menuName}, #{mDto.category}, #{mDto.imgUrl}, #{mDto.VIEW}, #{mDto.type})
